name: Unexpected Futa Corruption
description:
Unexpected Futa Corruption is a game about how a beautiful and pure angel girl finds herself in bed with her unexpected futanari date. She turns into a horny slutty futa-slut as they explore their fantasies together and with other futa girls from the neighborhood.

Hesitant at first she didn't want anything to do with the futanari. She thought she'd find a pure lesbian soulmate to share her perfect life with. Little did she know that soon she'd be begging her futa neighbour for sex while her friends watched. A perfect angel who had her whole perfect life lined up, only to have the fantasy shattered by the reality of her unsatiable horniness.

The gameplay consists of solving a series of match 3 puzzles with a visual novel dialogue in-between. You also get to make choices that affect the gameplay.

Features:

- Visual novel elements before and after each game.
- Polished Match 3 gameplay with a custom implementation with attention to detail.
- High quality CG render unlocked after every game.
- Failure to progress is also progress.
- Explicit sex scenes!

Rules of the match 3:

- You must match 3 or more of the same gems in a row or column.
- Each gem type has a different meaning and effect.
- You must keep an eye on your points as well as remaining turns counter.
- You must "defeat" the opponent - your date - by matching heart symbols and seducing them.
- You can also use skills to alter the game. But be careful, they only have limited amount of uses!
